scripts.translate: npm run translate:pot && npm run translate:update
scripts.translate:update: for file in ./resources/lang/*.po; do wp i18n update-po ./resources/lang/sage.pot $file; done
scripts.translate:compile: npm run translate:mo && npm run translate:js
scripts.format-staged-views: git diff --cached --name-only --relative | grep '^resources/views/' | xargs prettier --write | grep -v "unchanged" | awk '{print $1}' | while read -r file; do git diff "$file"; done
